item.name: the status of shard2 mongod in this server
the number of available connections to mongod
the number of currently active connections to mongod
the number of cursors that mongod server is maintaining for clients
the total number of cursors that have timed out since mongod started
the total number of documents deleted
the total number of documents inserted
the total number of documents returned by queries
the total number of documents updated
the number of operations that are currently queued and waiting for the read lock
the total number of operations queued waiting for the lock
the number of operations that are currently queued and waiting for the write lock
the amount of RAM that is currently used by mongod (Mb)
the amount of virtual memory that is used by mongod(Mb)
the number of bytes that reflects the amount of network traffic received by mongod
the number of bytes that reflects the amount of network traffic sent from mongod
the number of delete operations since mongod last started
the number of getmore operations since mongod last started
the number of insert operations since mongod last started
the number of query operations since mongod last started
the number of update operations since mongod last started
the total number of replicated delete operations since mongod last started
the total number of replicated insert operations since mongod last started
the total number of replicated update operations since mongod last started
the total number of page faults in mongod
the total number of documents scanned during queries and query-plan evaluation
the running time of mongod in this server (seconds)

trigger.name: the number of available connections for shard2 mongod is less than $1
the shard2 mongod instance in this server is down
